releases.name: v1.0.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- Added Apple rubbery wood virus 1
- Added Apple rubbery wood virus 2
- Added Grapevine virus H
- Added 23 isolates for Grapevine virus T
- Added 4 isolates for Grapevine leafroll-associated virus 1

- Removed 1 Apricot latent virus isolate

releases.name: v1.0.0
releases.body:
- added all Genbank isolates for ASPV
- fixed isolate names from some poorly named isolates
- removed viruses and isolates used by the developers that haven't yet been published to Genbank
- separated Apple stem pitting (ASPV) and Apricot latent viruses (ApLV)

latest.name: v0.2.1
latest.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles

releases.name: v0.2.1
releases.body: - remove some annotations that didn't have corresponding profiles

releases.name: v0.2.0
releases.body:
- the first release using TravisCI for building and testing
- merge annotations and profiles into one archive

latest.name: v3.9.8
latest.body:
#### Added
- report MongoDB version in API responses
- add support and upgrade information to **Home** view

#### Fixed
- fix exception when creating samples with FASTQ files containing a lot of 3' Ns
- resolve client security issue in dependency

releases.name: v4.0.0-beta.5
releases.body:
#### Added
- improved quick analysis dialog with support for multiple sample library types

#### Changed
- always show _Pathoscope_ instead of _PathoscopeBowtie_
- improve appearance of checkboxes
- improve appearance of dialogs
- improve appearance of sample list items

#### Fixed
- fix errors when removing cancelled jobs
- fix poor performance during file uploads

releases.name: v4.0.0-beta.4
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix broken websocket connection in browser
- fix error in Pathoscope workflows during subtraction step
- fix missing **Add Isolate** link in empty OTUs
- fix missing styles due to problem with content security policy

releases.name: v4.0.0-beta.3
releases.body:
#### Added
- support browser caching of analysis retrieval (`GET`) requests

#### Changed
- miscellaneous minor aesthetic improvements
- simplify unnecessarily complicated reference export mechanism

#### Fixed
- fix **Add Sequence** dialog not opening
- fix bad subtraction link in Pathoscope mapping overview
- fix missing settings errors when starting with `--no-setup`
- fix unrounded median values (#1833)

releases.name: v4.0.0-beta.2
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix exception about missing `sentry_sdk` module

releases.name: v4.0.0-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- allow subtraction renaming
- allow deletion of any subtraction, not just unused ones
- automatically reconnect when server connection is lost (#1787, #1750)
- make default subtractions for samples optional

#### Changed
- format JSON different depending on the request's `Accept` header
- improve appearance of AODP joining chart y-axis (#1801)
- improve appearance of OTU editor
- improve appearance of user permission list
- improve and harmonize appearance of analysis sorting buttons (#1779)
- the term _Workflow_ will now replace _Algorithm_

#### Fixed
- fix appearance of pathoscope mapping overview
- fix appearance of sequence close button in OTU editor (#1807)
- fix broken coloring of history information icons
- fix incorrect values in root (`GET /api`) response
- fix revert icon being shown for history items that cannot be reverted (built changes)
- fix gap in reference creation dialog (#1800)
- fix Pathoscope analysis sort order for coverage and depth
- improve speed of fetching Pathoscope results using caching (#1295)
- improve and fix display of official reference installation message

releases.name: v4.0.0-alpha.7
releases.body:
#### Changed
- improve Pathoscope result fetch times by caching coverage charts
- make graph resizing consistent when browser size is changed
- update button styling
- update job progress bar coloring
- update upload bar styling

#### Fixed
- fix issues when trying to delete multiple analyses or files
- fix sessions expiring too early
- remove extra OTU detail view header

releases.name: v4.0.0-alpha.6
releases.body:
#### Added
- add descriptions for all AODP job steps

#### Changed
- filter AODP results by maximum OTU identity instead of minimum

#### Fixed
- fix clipping on sequence x-axis labels in NuVs viewer
- fix problem with ORF graphics in NuVs viewer not resizing when window size changes
- fix tiny tiny font size for login dialog error (#1786)

releases.name: v3.9.8
releases.body:
#### Added
- report MongoDB version in API responses
- add support and upgrade information to **Home** view

#### Fixed
- fix exception when creating samples with FASTQ files containing a lot of 3' Ns
- resolve client security issue in dependency

releases.name: v4.0.0-alpha.5
releases.body:
#### Changed
- show _no matches_ message when no AODP hits meet identity filter

#### Fixed
- fix crash when no AODP hits meet identity filter
- prevent misleading fatal `git` error from writing to console during startup

releases.name: v3.9.7
releases.body:
#### Changed
- include software libraries in distributable that are missing on some platforms
- provide failing quality line when raising error during FastQC parsing

releases.name: v4.0.0-alpha.4
releases.body:
#### Changed
- update Pathoscope viewer

#### Fixed
- fix crash when displaying AODP result
- fix index list item appearance (#1770)
- fix navigation bar appearance (#1768)

releases.name: v4.0.0-alpha.3
releases.body:
#### Added
- add AODP result viewer (#1743)
- add AODP analysis option in creation dialog (#1748)
- implement AODP as a analysis algorithm

#### Changed
- update application appearance (#1685, #1703, #1711, #1712, #1714, #1717, #1729, #1736, #1743, #1749)
- make view headers consistent
- overhaul input interfaces
- return `data_type` from API when fetching ready indexes
- show 'None Found' when no targets assigned for barcode reference (#1720)

#### Fixed
- fix crash when client loads sample settings
- fix error in remove schema segment dialog (#1724)
- fix error when editing OTU sequence
- fix error when OTU schema tab is viewed (#1709)
- fix issues importing and exporting references (#1741)
- fix issues in clone reference dialog (#1690)

releases.name: v3.9.7-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix incorrect subtraction counts for Pathoscope analyses (#1747)
- fix platform-specific issues due to `cx-Freeze` package
- upgrade packages with security issues

releases.name: v3.9.6
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix `0` always being shown as subtracted read count in Pathoscope viewer (#1735)
- fix crash in browser when navigating to reference index list
- fix default subtraction always being used for new analysis (#1735)
- fix default subtraction name always shown in pathoscope viewer (#1735)
- fix default subtraction always returned when fetching analysis from API (#1735)

releases.name: v3.9.5
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix occasional crash in client when loading sample settings
- fix dialog for adding users to reference (#1686)
- fix issues when removing reference user groups
- fix misspelling of 'Administrator' in user dropdown
- fix icon padding in user administration detail header (#1688) 
- fix horizontal alignment in reference items in analysis dialog (#1689)

releases.name: v4.0.0-alpha.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- add library type selection component in sample creation dialog (#1585)
- add reference data type support to creation dialog (#1557)
- add target editor component for barcode references (#1673)
- check MongoDB server version on application start
- support `library_type` input field for sample creation requests (replaces `srna` field`)
- support `targets` input field for barcode reference edit requests for

#### Changed
- show **Library Type** in sample detail table (#1608)
- show **Date Type** in reference detail table
- support larger history records for large sequences or large remote reference OTUs
- update **Build Index** job to support barcode analysis
- update OTU editor to support barcode sequences (#1601, #1638)

#### Fixed
- fix uneven OTU editor sequence entry table column widths (#1665)
- fix real-time updates that had incomplete information

releases.name: v3.9.4
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix error when exporting pathoscope results
- fix non-functional browser back (#1189, #1575)

releases.name: v3.9.3
releases.body:
#### Changed
- allow browser uploads when file manager is disabled on server (supports MacOS hosts)
- don't run file manager on start when operating system is incompatible (supports MacOS hosts)

#### Fixed
- fix client crashes in job detail view (#1651)
- prevent flash of previously loaded analysis list or analysis detail (#1574)

releases.name: v3.9.2
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix crashes in some views that include times
- fix non-function job cleanup on application start

releases.name: v3.9.1
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix scrolling issue in large lists

releases.name: v3.9.0
releases.body:
#### Added
- add keyboard-based navigation to NuVs result viewer

#### Changed
- ensure application data folder is intact on every server start
- make clone and remote reference panels consistent in appearance with sibling panels (#1639)

#### Fixed
- fix appearance of API documentation link in administrative settings (#1627)
- fix client crash when there is no significant NuVs hit
- fix contradictory Sentry setup messages in log output
- fix incorrect modified OTU count being calculated for references
- fix refresh issue during setup that made it unclear the server was being restarted (#1570)
- fix server crash when caches data directory cannot be found
- fix unhandled exception when writing settings to database during setup (#1530)

releases.name: v3.8.6
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- resolve minor security issue in client

releases.name: v3.8.5
releases.body:
#### Added
- remove incomplete samples on application start

#### Changed
- improve job list item appearance
- improve administrative user detail view

#### Fixed
- fix useless job remove and cancel icons (#1603)
- fix visual bug in group list in administrative user interface (#1578)s

releases.name: v3.8.4
releases.body:
#### Added
- show user alert when trim cache files cannot be found

#### Changed
- create new trim cache during analysis when cache file cannot be found

releases.name: v3.8.3
releases.body:
#### Added
- add API setting in web interface (#1558)

#### Changed
- fix checkbox alignment in source type form
- improve application stability and testing
- show Gitter chat link instead of Discord in navigation bar
- update isolate editor appearance

#### Removed
- remove data table in OTU general info view

#### Fixed
- fix faulty API key authentication
- fix faulty reference import functionality
- fix security issue in `serialize-javascript` dependency
- throttle sample creation requests to prevent duplicate submissions (#1547)
- throttle remote reference creation requests to prevent duplicate submissions (#1569)

releases.name: v3.8.2
releases.body:
#### Changed
- appearance improvements for some user interface components
- prevent potential data loss when editing OTUs

#### Fixed
- fix incomplete parsing of Genbank definitions when fetching from NCBI (#1548)

releases.name: v3.8.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- prevent first user setup dialog from being too wide on large displays

#### Fixed
- fix BLAST spinner (#1520)
- fix link justification in reference user and groups settings
- fix various errors when viewing reference details (#1527, #1511, #1516, #1500)

releases.name: v3.8.0
releases.body:
#### Added
- allow choice of different subtraction for each analysis (#1231)
- samples have **Default Subtraction** setting instead of hard-linked **Subtraction Host** (#1231)
- show warning when sample files are unusually small (#1483)

#### Changed
- slight changes to user group administration dialog
- update appearance of alerts
- update appearance of isolate editor 
- update appearance of source type settings
- update appearance of HMM, history, and files list items (#1473, #1492, #1481, #1461, #1472)
- overhaul reference list items
- minor changes and improvements to many user interface elements

#### Fixed
- fix text alignment in pathoscope mapping overview (#1474)
- fix always depressed buttons
- fix non-removal of FASTQ files after they are used to create a sample (#1484)

releases.name: v3.8.0-beta.3
releases.body:
#### Changed
- slight changes to user group administration dialog

#### Fixed
- fix subtraction selection issues in sample creation dialog

releases.name: v3.8.0-beta.2
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix unwarranted no host error in create sample modal (#1504)

releases.name: v3.8.0-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- allow choice of different subtraction for each analysis (#1231)
- samples have **Default Subtraction** setting instead of hard-linked **Subtraction Host** (#1231)
- show warning when sample files are unusually small (#1483)

#### Changed
- update appearance of alerts
- update appearance of isolate editor 
- update appearance of source type settings
- update appearance of HMM, history, and files list items (#1473, #1492, #1481, #1461, #1472)
- overhaul reference list items
- minor changes and improvements to many user interface elements

#### Fixed
- fix text alignment in pathoscope mapping overview (#1474)
- fix always depressed buttons
- fix non-removal of FASTQ files after they are used to create a sample (#1484)

releases.name: v3.7.5
releases.body:
#### Added
- add debug logging for BLASTing


#### Changed
- allow users to retry failed and successful NuVs BLASTs
- show NCBI BLAST errors to users when they occurs
- use 'No name' as NuVs BLAST result name when actual name missing from NCBI response (#1469)

#### Fixed
- fix debug messages not showing in `--dev` mode
- fix unhandled `KeyError` when trying to retrieve record for importing sample via API (#1468)
- fix unhandled `BadZipFile` error when fetching BLAST result from NCBI (#1456)

releases.name: v3.7.4
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix error during database setup (#1403)
- fix server error when updating account (#1453)

releases.name: v3.7.3
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix HMM release installation bugs (#1454, #1455)

releases.name: v3.7.2
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix error when fetching list of jobs from server

releases.name: v3.7.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- update appearance of alerts
- update appearance of isolate detail view

#### Fixed
- fix error when running analysis on legacy samples (#1447)
- fix client security issues

releases.name: v3.7.0
releases.body:
#### Changed
- improve appearance of _404 Not found_ pages
- use retrieved complete Genbank accessions when autofilling sequence forms (#1397)

#### Fixed
- fix error when autofetching HMM data from internet (#1398)
- fix errors when downloading legacy sample files (#1432)

releases.name: v3.7.0-beta.2
releases.body:
#### Changed
- simplify file storage of oversized analysis records

#### Fixed
- fix incorrect pathoscope sorting when result viewer first renders
- fixed spelling error in API creation dialog

releases.name: v3.7.0-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- first user is now configured outside intial setup (#1314)
- minor improvement to login and forced password change views

#### Fixed
- fix broken pathoscope result sorting (#1415)
- fix issue in pathoscope median depth calculation (this may affect results in some cases)

releases.name: v3.6.0
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix BLAST issues in NuVs interface
- fix erroneously shown no OTU alert in indexes view
- fix OTU coverage chart bug (#1410)

releases.name: v3.6.0-beta.3
releases.body:
#### Changed
- make **Raw Data** and **Cached Trims** panels consistently styled in sample detail view

#### Fixed
- fix raw QC results being displayed as cache results
- fix crash when switching between isolates in pathoscope viewer

releases.name: v3.6.0-beta.2
releases.body:
#### Added
- add detailed logging for database connection failures during setup
- write all log lines to `virtool.log`; previously only some lines were written

#### Changes
- overhaul NuVs result viewer

#### Fixed
- fix broken searching in NuVs viewer
- fix buggy file manager list sorting

releases.name: v3.6.0-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- add API endpoint for getting cache detail (including QC)
- add views for cached trim quality diagrams (#1363)
- link to cache quality view from analysis detail view

#### Changed
- minor improvements to NuVs result viewer
- remove animations from pathoscope result viewer

#### Fixed
- fix alignment of job step icons and spinners (#1387)
- fix excessive filtering of NuVs results
- fix visual glitch where tab links rendered over top of main navigation bar

releases.name: v3.5.2
releases.body:
#### Changed
- capitalize _organism_ field in manage reference view
- remove all mention of barcodes from user interface; this will not be supported for now

#### Fixed
- fix incomplete job cleanup in analysis jobs
- fix error in NuVs during _Reunite Pairs_ step (#1386)

releases.name: v3.5.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- improve upload dialog

#### Fixed
- fix bugs in reference member management interface
- fix bugs in sample file replacement upload interface (#1377)

releases.name: v3.5.0
releases.body:
#### Added
- accept gzip-compressed subtraction FASTA files (#1373)
- show alert about administrator API keys in API key creation dialog
- show alert on sample quality page for samples with no raw data (#1364)
- subtraction FASTA files are now retained; download will be introduced later (#1382)

#### Changed
- hide administration link in navigation drop down if user is not administrator
- improve rendering of task arguments in job detail view
- improve user interface tabs
- make identicons circular
- remove unused client styling code
- simplify account page
- update appearance of checkbox setting components

#### Fixed
- don't limit permissions for new administrator API keys
- fix client crash when navigating to HMM settings
- fix errors due to incorrect parsing of config files or values (#1348)
- gracefully handle errors when inotify watches cannot be configured on start (#1349)

releases.name: v3.4.0
releases.body:
#### Changed
- automatically strip white space from API inputs where appropriate
- remove unfinished (zombie) jobs on application start
- remove unfinished analysis on application start

releases.name: v3.4.0-beta.3
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix non-functional realtime updates
- fix various Python code issues
- restore missing download_and_parse_release() function

#### Removed
- drop mean depth option for Pathoscope view

releases.name: v3.4.0-beta.2
releases.body:
#### Added
- add missing `Location` headers for some API responses


#### Fixed
- fix errors when handling certain real time updates in client (#1350, #1351, #1352)
- fix crash when loading Pathoscope result
- update some Javascript packages with security issues

releases.name: v3.4.0-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- allow explicit selection of paired read orientation during sample creation
- allow export of Pathoscope reports in `csv` or `xlsx` formats (#1300)
- allow replacement of trimmed sample data with original raw files (#1322, #1066)
- new tab for downloading and viewing sample files and trim caches
- show consensus coverage charts for OTUs (merged from isolates)
- speed up sample data compression using `pigz` when available

#### Changed
- improve appearance of job detail view
- improve appearance of pathoscope hits
- make job stage names more consistent and meaningful
- move read trimming step to analysis from sample creation
- retain raw data for samples (#1066)
- overhaul presentation of overall Pathoscope mapping result

#### Fixed
- fix rendered units for data sizes (_MiB_ -> _MB_)

releases.name: v3.4.0-alpha.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- implement user interface for searching samples by analysis state
- search for samples by (documentation pending) analysis state on API

#### Fixed
- fix variation in sample algorithm label width between color variants

releases.name: v3.3.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- improved testing
- miscellaneous code maintenance

#### Fixed
- fix error when headers missing in GitHub API response (#1272)
- fix `InvalidStateError` on server when fetching reference detail (#1311)
- fix remote reference version not changing when update completes (#1278)
- fix index build required alert shown in OTUs list even when no build is required (#1280)

releases.name: v3.3.0
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix migration of HTTP server configuration from `settings.json`

releases.name: v3.3.0-beta.1
releases.body:
#### Added
- automatically migrate old `settings.json` configuration to new model
- expose more application configuration options
- segment value field for sequences in OTU detail view (#1291)
- sequence length indicator in OTU detail view (#1291)
- take all config values from `config.json`, environmental variable, and command line arguments
- validate instance and job resource limits on server start (#1285)

#### Changed
- automatically strip OTU names when created or edited (#1291)
- overhaul initial setup interface
- use `config.json` as config file and only load on server start
- use MongoDB connection strings instead of individual parameters
- use single proxy address as connection parameter instead of individual parts
- store some settings in database instead of file

#### Removed
- remove settings user interface components for settings derived from `config.json`

#### Fixed
- fix broken add analysis button (#1285)
- fix buggy active state on OTU tab in OTU detail view
- fix real time update bugs in sample analysis lists
- fix crash when adding group and (#1287)
- fix incorrect _In Progress_ label for some analyses (#1292)
- fix members missing from detail view (#1277)
- fix missing schema and sequence segment assignments in imported and remoted references
- fix monospace styling on sequence `textarea` field
- fix problem adding unnamed isolates (#1291)
- fix source type checking
- fix `z-index` visual bug in reference settings view (#1273)

releases.name: v3.2.3
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix broken file upload and watch features

releases.name: v3.2.2
releases.body:
#### Fixed
- fix unhandled exception on start related to watch path

releases.name: v3.2.1
releases.body:
#### Changed
- don't show unready or in-use files in file lists
- limit visible reference cards to those the user can access
- redirect to login page if session expires (#1258)
- redirect to OTU list if the complete history for an OTU is removed (#1223)

#### Fixed
- fix early expiration of _remembered_ sessions (#1263)
- fix error when viewing HMM list (#1260)
- fix freeze in when all history for OTU is removed (#1223)
- fix unhandled error when analysis directory cannot be found during cleanup
- fix unhandled error when server version can't be determined (#1259)
- fix unhandled error on server start when `watch` directory cannot be found (#901)

releases.name: v3.2.0
releases.body:
#### Added
- allow reset password on login capability and forcing (#1190)
- add a remember me checkbox for login (#1190)
- automatically remove of orphaned analysis files generated as a result of an old bug (#765, #1187)
- timeout sessions (#1190)

#### Changed
- format numbers in Pathoscope and NuVs information tables (#1220)
- general security improvements
- improve layout of reference cards
- move reference removal button to reference settings
- simplify look of analysis pop-up for single-sample analyses (#1219)

#### Removed
- remove legacy database update code (#1022)

#### Fixed
- fix empty or malformed NuVs data download files (#1215)
- fix user management view bugs
- fix issues with scrolling lists and search bars arbitrarily containing numbers (#1243)
- fix instances of HMM install status being detected incorrectly
- fix job searching problems (#1216)
- fix problems in views displaying or editing reference data type and organism information

releases.name: v3.1.0
releases.body:
#### Changed
- make versions prior to `v3.0.0` update to `v3.0.0` before updating further

#### Fixed
- fix bug where owner of sample is prevented from analyzing it (#1234)
- use correct noun (not _OTU_) for sample removal dialog title (#1222)

releases.name: v3.0.0
releases.body:
#### Changed
- allow export of built reference content only
- allow export of referencees using the original remote OTU ids

#### Fixed
- fix a lot of miscellanous user interface bugs
- fix broken OTU filter button (#1212)
- fix bugs in job clear dropdown (#1211)
- fix remote reference not getting data type and organism from source (#1224)
- fix problem where user member groups are not options in primary group dropdown (#1221)
